query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chatMessages (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  conversation_id INT NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('user', 'assistant') NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  content_type ENUM('general', 'email', 'slide', 'script') DEFAULT 'general',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ENKfpgkx2S962Xx.root --database NYSDZ3CUp62WRWmJyXH7Fz --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS chatMessages (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  conversation_id INT NOT NULL,
  role ENUM('user', 'assistant') NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  content_type ENUM('general', 'email', 'slide', 'script') DEFAULT 'general',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
